title: here i am again LEONA 12/5 carry with adc. trolling team mate gets the win please where is tribunal

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
another post since YESTERDAY

I CARRIED PRE MUCH CHAT LOGS ETC ETC ETC everyone even said i am the carry

TOO BAD troll fuck mid akali gets a free win and never will
 WILL EVER FUCKING GAY BANNED CAUSE U PEOPLE NEVER FIX THAT ISSUE

people troll but fuck everyoen does sometime but start addressing the issue like NE does geez.

replies.body: How dare an AP mid laner lose to Kassadin

> [{quoted}](name=RainbowWindslash,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AqbNFBYh,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-16T08:13:08.191+0000)
>
> How dare an AP mid laner lose to Kassadin

Its not like Kassasin has a spell shield and starts with like 40% magic damage resistance or anything, before runes and masteries. Not like Kassadin has the ability to assassinate the enemy when they try and get away with a long stream of teleports.

OH NO, AKALI DIDN'T DO WELL AND PROBABLY LOST LANE! HOW DARE SHE! LET'S BAN HER FOR HAVING A BAD GAME.

%%%% off.
stfu noob gtfo and go suck a %%%%

> [{quoted}](name=bdarawr,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AqbNFBYh,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-07T05:56:15.923+0000)
>
> stfu noob gtfo and go suck a %%%%

You're a cutie. You have provided no evidence that this Akali trolled. In fact, by their score it looks like they tried to win but was beaten that game, which happens. Are you saying that everyone who loses lane once in a while should be banned from the game? Okay then. I'm sure you need to be banned too, because even LCS players lose lane.

mate a 0/15 LOL are u mentally challenged and not 1 assist okay mate stfu and go learn how to play

im assuming your %%%% %%%% kda is the reason why you cant see the logic. noobz

> [{quoted}](name=bdarawr,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AqbNFBYh,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-16T03:20:34.538+0000)
>
> mate a 0/15 LOL are u mentally challenged and not 1 assist okay mate stfu and go learn how to play
> 
> im assuming your %%%% %%%% kda is the reason why you cant see the logic. noobz

You're so rude. I hope I am never matched with you. What 0/15/0? We are talking about an Akali with 11 deaths, some assists and some kills and okay farm.
Even if I were mentally challenged, at least I understand what the conversation is about.
